name: Caffeetest
description: Caffeetest is a full-featured bug and test case management web application designed to help QA teams and developers efficiently track, manage, and resolve project bugs in real-time. With its cloud-based collaboration capabilities, it enables seamless communication among team members, making it ideal for distributed teams.
features: Bug tracking with priority and severity labels
Test case creation and execution tracking
Real-time cloud synchronization and collaboration
Dark/light mode support with modern UI animations
Advanced search and filtering for quick access to issues
Detailed bug reporting with actual vs expected results
Team login with role-based access control (RBAC)
useCases: Ideal for small to medium QA teams managing multiple projects
Solo testers or developers needing a clean UI to document bugs
Startups that want a lightweight alternative to tools like Jira
Students or open-source contributors managing testing workflows
futurePlans: Add file/image attachments to bug reports
Export reports to CSV/JSON formats
Dashboard analytics and performance metrics
Email notifications for bug updates
AI-assisted bug categorization and suggestions

name: Space Time
description: Space Time is a visually engaging frontend project that delivers a unique UI/UX experience focused on interactivity and elegant design. It serves as a showcase of animated layout transitions and component structures, ideal for personal portfolios or themed content displays.
features: Responsive UI with animated transitions
Creative layout with theme-driven design
Interactive visual sections
Optimized for performance with clean architecture
Deployed using Vercel for fast delivery
useCases: Landing pages for startups or products
futurePlans: Add dynamic content using a CMS
Convert to full-stack with backend support
Enhance performance with lazy loading
Add dark/light mode toggle
Integrate custom animations and SVG paths

name: Load Test Dashboard
description: An advanced dashboard designed to help developers and QA engineers analyze, compare, and visualize K6 load testing reports with detailed metrics and modern UI.
features: Devloper can comment and fetch the issue with these reports in real time
Visual representation of requests, responses, and performance metrics
Real-time test summary with average response time, checks passed, and request count
Dark/light mode support with smooth animations and transitions
Support for grouped metrics and labeled test categories
Search and filter by API name or status code
Team collaboration with project name saving and local data persistence
useCases: QA teams validating API performance under load
Developers analyzing the performance impact of new deployments
Teams needing visual test reporting without complex dashboards
Freelancers and students learning performance testing via K6
futurePlans: Support drag-and-drop or file upload for K6 results (JSON format)
Export load test analysis as PDF, CSV, or JSON
Integrated AI assistant for interpreting performance data
Shareable report links with read-only access
CI/CD pipeline integration with real-time test result posting
